actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 94-344.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution waiving certain points of order against H.R. 8365. A bill making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1976, and the period ending September 30, 1976.

summary.text: Waives specified points of order against the bill (H.R. 8365) making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for fiscal year 1976, and the period ending September 30, 1976.

titles.title: Resolution waiving certain points of order against H.R. 8365. A bill making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1976, and the period ending September 30, 1976.
